Product Information

IEEE 802.3at/IEEE 802.3bt POE Switch with custom signal support.

Features

  • Power over ethernet
  • Custom signal capability
  • Auto PD classification

Technical Specifications

  • Model: x1000GP Switch
  • Ports: 6 Gigabit Ethernet ports
  • Speed: 1 Gbps
  • Switch: KSZ9897
  • POE: TPS23881
